oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STO syntax (v2) - LMF format
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Braasch, Anna
Olsen, Sussi
Hansen, Dorte Haltrup
Offersgaard, Lene
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: syntax
LMF
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The STO (SprogTeknologisk Ordbase) lexicon is a comprehensive computational lexicon of Danish developed for NLP/HLT applications. The syntax layer of the lexicon, presented here in Lexical Markup Format (LMF), contains a vocabulary of 84,159 entries (nouns, verbs and adjectives). The syntax is linked to the morphological layer through ID's. The Lexical Markup Language is an internationally well‐known and accepted XML format and the ISO standard for Natural Language Processing (NLP) lexicons. See www.lexicalmarkupframework.org for more information on LMF and the attached documentation for the marke-up of STO. STO LMF is created within the framework of the EU project MetaNord, and was carried out by Center for Language Technology (CST) in 2011 - 2013
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Centre for Language Technology, NorS, University of Copenhagen
